long_description: With strong carabiner gates, a bottle opener and an included split ring for your keys, the Chums Infinity+1 Utility Carabiner will help you with all kinds of clipping and carrying needs. Made of brushed stainless steel with spring gates to keep items secure. Flat profile lets you shove it easily in a pocket. The Chums Infinity+1 Utility Carabiner is great for clipping a water bottle, solar charger or pair of sandals to the outside of your pack. Not intended for rock climbing or other weight-bearing activities.
short_description: With strong carabiner gates, a bottle opener and an included split ring for your keys, the Chums Infinity+1 Utility Carabiner will help you with all kinds of clipping and carrying needs.
